snippet.title: How to Deploy Custom Backend to Cloud using Heroku (Ep 5)
snippet.description:
Custom backend servers are only useful if you can reach it from the web and mobile applications.  Today's lesson will go over how to deploy our current NodeJS server onto the cloud.  Doing this is actually quite simple using the terminal.  Let's begin!
